title: Looking for flex team (Bronze - Silver)

embed.description: LeeroFTW / Silver 4 31LP / 28W 21L Win Ratio 57% / Varus - 6W 4L Win Ratio 60%, Orianna - 5W 5L Win Ratio 50%, Fizz - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%, Taliyah - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%, Veigar - 3W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body: Looking for a flex team to chill and climb with in flex, I prefer ADC and Mid but can play other roles if needed (except jungle).

replies.body:
Hey

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold
